alert.note: Alert for Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 4:59PM EDT until August 28 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... West central Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Vernon, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Live Oak, Eucheeanna, Millers Ferry, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, and Knox Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
